text: Shyama (Khurshid Akhtar; 7 June 1935 â€“ 14 November 2017) was a Bollywood actress. Her best known roles were in Aar Paar (1954), Barsaat Ki Raat (1960) and Tarana (1951). She was born in Lahore, Punjab, British India (now Pakistan). Shyama died in Mumbai, India on 14 November 2017 from complications of a lung infection at the age of 82. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Shyama Filmography Upperstall Category:1935 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from respiratory tract infection Category:Infectious disease deaths in India Category:Indian movie actors
title: Shyama
